trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um controle de editor que permite aos usuários finais editar várias propriedades de interface de usuário em um associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the behavior of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe BehaviorEditorPart é um controle de editor que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e é usado para editar as propriedades que afetam o comportamento de um associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: Apenas há orientada a ferramenta zonas no conjunto de controle de Web Parts (para obter detalhes, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>Visão geral da classe), existem controles orientada a ferramenta parte (partes de ferramenta), e cada parte da ferramenta deve residir em um determinado tipo de zona de ferramenta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Partes de ferramenta no conjunto de controle de Web Parts têm características de distinção dois:-são controles de auxiliar que permitem aos usuários finais personalizem controles em uma página de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: - They are visible only in certain display modes.
trans-unit.target: -Elas são visíveis apenas em certos modos de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: O controle BehaviorEditorPart é uma parte de ferramenta fica visível apenas quando uma página de Web Parts está em modo de edição e quando um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle foi selecionado para edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: Controle BehaviorEditorPart, como todos os outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controla, reside em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona só pode conter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles não podem ser colocados em qualquer outro tipo de zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The control is not displayed on the page under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: O controle não é exibido na página sob determinadas condições.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property value on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle que está sendo editado é `true`e a página está no escopo de personalização de usuário (que é o padrão), o controle não é exibido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the BehaviorEditorPart control to be displayed in this scenario, typically you would need to follow two steps: - Add an entry to the Web.config file that gives an authorized user permission to edit Web pages in shared personalization scope (which means that the changes the user makes will be visible to all users of the application).
trans-unit.target: Para o controle BehaviorEditorPart a ser exibido neste cenário, normalmente você precisaria siga duas etapas:-adicionar uma entrada ao arquivo Web. config que dê uma permissão de usuário autorizado ao editar páginas da Web no escopo de personalização compartilhado (o que significa que as alterações feitas pelo usuário será visíveis para todos os usuários do aplicativo).

trans-unit.source: - Programmatically change the page from user-level to shared-level personalization scope at run time, for example by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Altere programaticamente a página de nível de usuário para nível compartilhado escopo de personalização em tempo de execução, por exemplo, usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to make the BehaviorEditorPart control visible in a page, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como fazer o controle BehaviorEditorPart visíveis em uma página, consulte a seção exemplo deste tópico.

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared controls and personalization scope, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre controles compartilhados e escopo de personalização, consulte [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart class also has an important method, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: A classe BehaviorEditorPart também tem um método importante, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, que ele herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e substituições.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited and assigning them to the fields of the editing control.
trans-unit.target: O método é fundamental, porque ele permite obter os valores de propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle que está sendo editado e atribuindo-os aos campos de controle de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the BehaviorEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:behavioreditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, o controle BehaviorEditorPart deve ser usado em formato de persistência da página, declarando um `<asp:behavioreditorpart>` elemento dentro de um `<zonetemplate>` elemento, que por sua vez, está contido por um `<asp:editorzone>` elemento em uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O controle de BehaviorEditorPart permite que os usuários finais editar as seguintes propriedades de interface do usuário de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A>Editar outras propriedades e o comportamento de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles, você pode usar outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles fornecidos com o conjunto de controles de Web Parts.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Esses controles incluem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles devem fornecer a maioria dos recursos de edição necessárias para editar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>os controles, mas você também pode criar um controle editor personalizado por herança da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the BehaviorEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para melhorar o acesso, o controle BehaviorEditorPart é renderizado dentro de um `<fieldset>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the BehaviorEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: O `<fieldset>` elemento agrupa um conjunto relacionado de controles usados para edição no controle BehaviorEditorPart e facilita a navegação com guias entre esses controles para os agentes do usuário visual (como navegadores comuns) e os agentes de usuário orientada a fala (como o software de leitura de tela).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Acessibilidade a marcação processada por padrão para este controle pode não estar de acordo com os padrões de acessibilidade, como as diretrizes de prioridade 1 conteúdo WCAG Web Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 ().

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre o suporte de acessibilidade para este controle, consulte [controles ASP.NET e acessibilidade](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: O construtor BehaviorEditorPart é um padrão. Nenhum construtor está declarado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>classe e tarefas especiais, portanto, não são executadas quando uma nova instância da classe é criada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to a page declaratively at design time.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente você não precisa usar o construtor, porque você pode adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controle a uma página de forma declarativa em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control programmatically for some reason, you can use the BehaviorEditorPart constructor.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se você precisar adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controle programaticamente por algum motivo, você pode usar o construtor BehaviorEditorPart.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Salva os valores de uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> controle para as propriedades correspondentes na associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges é um método crítico em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Finalidade do método é salvar os valores que um usuário tiver definido em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controle para as propriedades correspondentes na associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O controle associado é referenciado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>herdado do controle do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set a number of user interface (UI)-related property values on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges tenta definir um número de interface do usuário (IU)-relacionados a valores de propriedade em associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the property values that are set in this method, see the Remarks in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos valores de propriedade são definidas nesse método, consulte os comentários no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks an OK verb or an apply verb in the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges é chamado quando o usuário clica em um verbo Okey ou um verbo aplicar na edição IU.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ação de salvar os valores do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> o controle para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle for bem-sucedida; caso contrário (se ocorrer um erro), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro ao tentar definir o valor de uma propriedade em associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the default button on the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ID do botão padrão no controle.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultButton property overrides the base property to set several attributes on the property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DefaultButton substitui a propriedade base para definir vários atributos da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The property cannot be used with themes, and it cannot be browsed with a design-time user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: A propriedade não pode ser usada com temas e ele não pode ser pesquisado com uma tempo de design de interface do usuário ().

trans-unit.source: The value of the property is retrieved from the base property value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade é recuperado do valor da propriedade base.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser definida por temas ou temas de folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [capas e temas do ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the default button.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a ID do botão padrão.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um controle deve ser exibido quando seus associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: The Display property returns a value of `true`, meaning that the control will be displayed, except in one case.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de exibição retorna um valor de `true`, que significa que o controle será exibido, exceto em um caso.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property value on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle que está sendo editado é `true`e a página está no escopo de personalização de usuário (que é o padrão), o controle não é exibido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the steps required, and a code example that shows how to cause the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to be displayed for editing, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class overview and code example.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma explicação das etapas necessárias e um exemplo de código que mostra como fazer com que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controle a ser exibido para edição, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>Visão geral e o código de exemplo da classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set is designed with the assumption that shared controls--controls that are visible to all users--should be visible for editing only when a page is in shared personalization scope, meaning that the editing changes are visible to all users.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de controles de Web Parts foi projetado com a suposição de que compartilhado controles – controles que são visíveis para todos os usuários, deve estar visível para edição somente quando a página estiver no escopo de personalização compartilhado, o que significa que a edição alterações são visíveis a todos os usuários.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se o controle deve ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera os valores de propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> de controle e os atribui associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é um método crítico em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Ele implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>método da classe base, recupera os valores atuais de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar e atualiza os controles de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controle com esses valores para um usuário pode editá-los.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é chamado sempre que os valores associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle pode ter alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona que contém o controle chama o método SyncChanges, para que os valores de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controle sempre são sincronizados com os valores associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um título para o controle de editor.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade Title é exibido na barra de título de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlar quando o controle está visível no modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle for declarado em uma página, você pode definir um valor para o `Title` atributo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Se você não fornecer um valor para o título, um valor específico da cultura padrão é usado para descrever as propriedades que esse controle permite que os usuários editem.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que é usada como o título do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é um nome de controle calculado fornecidas pelo conjunto de controle de Web Parts.
